results.description: Compare reported EPS vs consensus estimate to capture earnings surprise. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using earnings_per_share_reported and est_eps. SUGGESTION2: no vector fields detected so not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.6 so ts_backfill not needed. SUGGESTION4: used high userCount fields (est_eps userCount 1430). KEEP_IN_MIND: implementation uses 2 datafields and 2 operators. Confidence 0.78.

Measure recent actual sales surprise and normalize over time. Applied SUGGESTION1 using actual_sales_value_annual and est_sales. SUGGESTION2: no vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: est_sales has strong userCount. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.72.

Capture direction of analyst EPS revisions by comparing current estimate to previous estimate. SUGGESTION1: used est_eps and anl4_dez1qfv4_preest (previous estimate). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages high so not applied. SUGGESTION4: both have solid userCounts. Kept simple two-operator implementation. Confidence 0.70.

Standardize reported CFO surprise vs mean of analyst cashflow estimate. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_cfo_value and est_cashflow_op. SUGGESTION2: no vectors. SUGGESTION3: coverage >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: chosen fields have reasonable userCount. Implementation kept under limits. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share unexpected move
results.description: Spot unexpected changes in FCF per share by comparing reported and estimated values. SUGGESTION1: used free_cash_flow_per_share and est_fcf_ps. SUGGESTION2: none vector. SUGGESTION3: free_cash_flow_per_share coverage ~0.49 <0.6 so ts_backfill applied to improve coverage. SUGGESTION4: est_fcf_ps moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND adhered. Confidence 0.60.

Normalized difference between reported EBITDA and analyst mean. SUGGESTION1 used ebitda_reported_value and est_ebitda. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.58; no backfill. SUGGESTION4: est_ebitda userCount ok. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.65.

Scale surprise of reported net income vs mean estimates. SUGGESTION1: used net_income_total_2 and est_netprofit. SUGGESTION2: none vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.7 so not applied. SUGGESTION4: est_netprofit high userCount. Simplicity respected. Confidence 0.67.

Recent change in reported pretax income relative to estimates. SUGGESTION1: used pretax_income_reported_value and est_ptp. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: pretax field coverage ~0.42; applied ts_backfill to pretax_income_reported_value. SUGGESTION4: est_ptp userCount adequate. Kept to 2 fields and 2 operators. Confidence 0.58.

Detect surprises in book value per share versus consensus. SUGGESTION1: used anl4_bvps_value and est_bookvalue_ps. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages ~0.52-0.67 >0.6? anl4_bvps_value 0.5245 <0.6 so ts_backfill applied to anl4_bvps_value. SUGGESTION4: est_bookvalue_ps high userCount. Confidence 0.56.

Capital expenditure reported vs analyst capex mean. SUGGESTION1: used capital_expenditure_reported_value and est_capex. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: capital_expenditure_reported_value coverage ~0.66 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: est_capex decent userCount. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.62.

Detect SG&A deviations: reported vs mean estimate. SUGGESTION1 used selling_general_admin_expense and est_sga. SUGGESTION2: no vector. SUGGESTION3: selling_general_admin_expense coverage 0.6346 >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: est_sga lower userCount but included for diversification. Confidence 0.54.

High dispersion in EPS estimates often precedes volatility. SUGGESTION1: used earnings_per_share_standard_deviation and earnings_per_share_estimate_count. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: stddev coverage ~0.72 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: used high alphaCount fields. Implementation kept simple. Confidence 0.61.

Measure recent change in analyst mean EPS to capture momentum. SUGGESTION1: used est_eps and anl4_dez1afv4_preest (previous est). SUGGESTION2: none vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: est_eps strong userCount. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Sales trend vs EPS trend correlation
results.description: Stocks where sales and EPS trends decouple may be interesting. SUGGESTION1: used ts_corr(est_sales, est_eps, 60). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields have reasonable userCounts. Implementation uses single operator. Confidence 0.59.

Count of upward EPS estimates signals positive sentiment. SUGGESTION1: used anl4_ady_pu (number of upper estimations) and anl4_adxqfv110_pu. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages ~0.72 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: very high userCounts for these fields. Confidence 0.68.

Cross-sectional zscore of EPS surprise to identify relative winners. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps) then zscore. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill needed. SUGGESTION4: used high userCount fields. Confidence 0.75.

Stocks with guidance values above analyst mean may outperform. SUGGESTION1: used max_reported_eps_guidance and eps_previous_estimate_value. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages 1.0 and 0.9886 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields have lower userCount but high coverage. Confidence 0.55.

Recent change in cashflow from operations relative to estimates. SUGGESTION1: used operating_cashflow_reported_value and anl4_cfo_mean. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both >0.6 coverage so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: anl4_cfo_mean userCount moderate. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share momentum
results.description: TS change of est_fcf_ps to capture improving cash generation. SUGGESTION1: used est_fcf_ps and est_fcf (mean). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: est_fcf_ps coverage 0.4642 <0.6 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: moderate userCounts. Confidence 0.52.

Large number of estimates with low revision indicates stability. SUGGESTION1: used earnings_per_share_estimate_count and anl4_basicconltv110_numest. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages ~1.0/0.70 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: very high userCounts. Confidence 0.60.

Divide EPS surprise by stddev of estimates to prioritize surprising but consensused moves. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps) and earnings_per_share_standard_deviation. SUGGESTION2: none vector. SUGGESTION3: stddev coverage 0.7237 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields with good userCounts. Confidence 0.74.

Measure divergence between EPS trend and sales trend with ts_corr negative sign. SUGGESTION1: used ts_corr(ts_delta(est_eps,4), ts_delta(est_sales,4), 60). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill needed. SUGGESTION4: both have strong userCounts. Confidence 0.58.

Ratio of max guidance to analyst mean signals conservatism in estimates. SUGGESTION1: used max_adjusted_eps_guidance and est_eps. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages=1.0 and ~0.78 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields chosen for coverage. Confidence 0.57.

Change in number of upper estimations indicates bullish analyst behavior. SUGGESTION1: used anl4_adxqfv110_pu and anl4_adxqfv110_down for net revisions. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage ~0.6979 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: high userCounts. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Reported vs guided gross income surprise
results.description: Compare gross_income_reported_value with an estimation mean. SUGGESTION1: used gross_income_reported_value and est_grossincome. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: est_grossincome userCount adequate. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: High analyst disagreement as volatility predictor
results.description: High std dev of sales estimates implies uncertainty. SUGGESTION1: used sales_estimate_standard_deviation and sales_estimate_count. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage ~0.7259 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: used fields with decent userCounts. Confidence 0.60.

Compare max_reported_pretax_income_guidance to pretax_income_total. SUGGESTION1: used max_reported_pretax_income_guidance and pretax_income_total. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: limited userCounts but high coverage. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Earnings z-score scaled by estimate count
results.description: Downweight surprise when estimate count is small. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps) and earnings_per_share_estimate_count. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: count field high userCount. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Free cash flow surprise vs guidance
results.description: Compare free_cash_flow_reported_value vs guidance/estimates. SUGGESTION1: used free_cash_flow_reported_value and anl4_fcf_value. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage ~0.5288 low so ts_backfill applied to free_cash_flow_reported_value. SUGGESTION4: anl4_fcf_value userCount high. Confidence 0.55.

Unexpected moves in book value per share vs mean may indicate valuation shifts. SUGGESTION1: used anl4_bvps_value and est_bookvalue_ps. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: anl4_bvps_value coverage ~0.5245 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: est_bookvalue_ps userCount robust. Confidence 0.57.

Cross-sectional rank of change in analyst mean EPS. SUGGESTION1: used ts_rank(ts_delta(est_eps, 30), 30). SUGGESTION2: no vector. SUGGESTION3: est_eps coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: high userCount for est_eps. Confidence 0.66.

Max guidance relative to previous estimate may reveal optimistic guidance. SUGGESTION1: used max_adjusted_eps_guidance and eps_previous_estimate_value. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields have acceptable counts. Confidence 0.54.

Growth in number of EPS estimates may indicate rising interest. SUGGESTION1: used earnings_per_share_estimate_count and anl4_afv4_eps_number. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages 1.0 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: both have userCount. Confidence 0.58.

Compare guidance EPS to most recent reported EPS to detect optimism. SUGGESTION1: used max_reported_eps_guidance and earnings_per_share_reported. SUGGESTION2: no vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: both fields strong. Confidence 0.56.

Cash Flow Per Share surprise vs analyst mean. SUGGESTION1: used actual_cashflow_per_share_value_quarterly and anl4_af_cfps_value. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: actual_cashflow coverage 0.4684 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: anl4_af_cfps_value userCount moderate. Confidence 0.50.

Scale reported EPS surprise by ts_std_dev of recent EPS surprises. SUGGESTION1: used ts_std_dev(ts_delta(est_eps,7), 60) and subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps). SUGGESTION2: none vector. SUGGESTION3: est_eps high coverage so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: uses time-series operators per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Sales surprise scaled by estimate count
results.description: Normalize sales surprise by number of sales estimates. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(actual_sales_value_annual, est_sales) and sales_estimate_count. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields have reasonable userCounts. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Earnings quality: reported vs adjusted EPS
results.description: Compare GAAP EPS to adjusted EPS mean to detect accounting noise. SUGGESTION1: used earnings_per_share_reported and est_epsa. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: est_epsa coverage low (0.1579) so ts_backfill applied to est_epsa. SUGGESTION4: earnings_per_share_reported high coverage. Confidence 0.48.

Changes in total goodwill vs mean estimates may signal impairments. SUGGESTION1: used total_goodwill_actual_value and est_tot_goodwill. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: total_goodwill_actual_value coverage 0.3761 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: est_tot_goodwill moderate userCount. Confidence 0.45.

Compare net_debt_reported_value vs analyst mean net debt. SUGGESTION1: used net_debt_reported_value and anl4_netdebt_mean. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: net_debt_reported_value coverage 0.3883 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: anl4_netdebt_mean userCount moderate. Confidence 0.46.

Use forecast type flags to detect waves of revisions. SUGGESTION1: used anl4_epsr_flag and anl4_ptp_flag (flags). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: both have very high userCounts. Confidence 0.63.

Ratio of reported EPS surprise to guidance magnitude. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps) and max_reported_eps_guidance. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill needed. SUGGESTION4: both fields reliable. Confidence 0.68.

TS trend in EPS estimate standard deviation signals rising uncertainty. SUGGESTION1: used ts_delta(earnings_per_share_standard_deviation, 30) and ts_zscore for standardization. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: stddev coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: selected high alphaCount field. Confidence 0.59.

Measure spread between guidance max and min for EPS to detect uncertainty. SUGGESTION1: used max_reported_eps_guidance and min_reported_eps_guidance. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverage 1.0 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: coverage prioritized. Confidence 0.52.

Low correlation of sales estimates and sales guidance can signal inconsistency. SUGGESTION1: used ts_corr(est_sales, sales_guidance_value, 60). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: sales_guidance_value coverage 0.4262 <0.6 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: est_sales strong userCount. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: EBIT surprise scaled by estimate dispersion

Weight EPS surprise by number of estimations to favor well-covered surprises. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps) and earnings_per_share_estimate_count. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: used high userCount for count. Confidence 0.72.

Recent acceleration in CFO surprise vs mean. SUGGESTION1: used operating_cashflow_reported_value and anl4_cfo_mean. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill as coverage >0.58. SUGGESTION4: fields have moderate userCounts. Confidence 0.60.

Large divergence between pretax and net income may indicate tax or one-off items. SUGGESTION1: used pretax_income_reported_value and net_income_total_2. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: pretax coverage low so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: net income field high coverage. Confidence 0.50.

Upward revisions in sales guidance vs previous guidance. Compare max_free_cash_flow_guidance to est_fcf. SUGGESTION1: used max_free_cash_flow_guidance and est_fcf. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields selected for high coverage. Confidence 0.51.

Net debt reported vs mean estimate normalized. SUGGESTION1: used net_debt_actual_value and anl4_netdebt_mean. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: net_debt_actual_value coverage ~0.3883 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: anl4_netdebt_mean userCount moderate. Confidence 0.46.

EBIT surprise vs analyst mean. SUGGESTION1: used ebit_reported_value and anl4_ebit_mean. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: ebit_reported_value coverage 0.9483 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: anl4_ebit_mean userCount good. Confidence 0.67.

Difference between mean and median of EPS estimates to capture skew. SUGGESTION1: used est_eps (mean) and earnings_per_share_median_value. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: est_eps high userCount. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share z-rank

SUGGESTION3: both coverages low so ts_backfill applied to reported. SUGGESTION4: fields low userCount but useful. Confidence 0.44.

Divide EPS surprise by sqrt of estimate count to stabilize signal. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps) and earnings_per_share_estimate_count. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: count field robust. Confidence 0.70.

Cross-sectional zscore on recent sales estimate acceleration. SUGGESTION1: used ts_zscore(ts_delta(est_sales, 30), 60). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: est_sales coverage >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: est_sales userCount good. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Estimate median vs mean sales anomaly
results.description: Difference between sales estimate mean and median detects skew. SUGGESTION1: used est_sales and sales_estimate_median_value. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: est_sales userCount high. Confidence 0.59.

Large number of upper estimations vs number of lower estimations. SUGGESTION1: used anl4_ady_pu and anl4_adxqfv110_down. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages ~0.7 no backfill. SUGGESTION4: very high userCounts; strong signal for sentiment shifts. Confidence 0.69.

TS product of last N EPS surprises to capture persistent positive surprises. SUGGESTION1: used ts_product(subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps), 5). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields chosen for high coverage. Confidence 0.62.

TS stddev of CFO estimates to detect rising uncertainty. SUGGESTION1: used ts_std_dev(anl4_cfo_mean, 60). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: anl4_cfo_mean coverage ~0.6232 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: anl4_cfo_mean userCount moderate. Confidence 0.57.

Cross-sectional zscore after normalizing by industry mean (group neutralize not used due to KEEP_IN_MIND3). Instead use zscore of surprise. Use difference between mean and median of net profit estimates. SUGGESTION1: used anl4_netprofit_mean and anl4_netprofit_median. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages ~0.76 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: userCounts high. Confidence 0.54.

Zscore of ts_sum of last 3 EPS surprises to capture accumulation. SUGGESTION1: used ts_sum(subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps), 3) then zscore. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: fields high coverage so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: limited operators. Confidence 0.68.

Compare maximum guidance now vs previous guidance to detect withdrawals. Combine number of estimates and low stddev to form confidence: anl4_basicconltv110_numest / anl4_capex_std. SUGGESTION1: used anl4_basicconltv110_numest and anl4_capex_std. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: anl4_capex_std coverage 0.2569 <0.6 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: number field has high userCount. Confidence 0.48.

Subtract guidance magnitude from reported surprise to penalize guided moves. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps) and max_reported_eps_guidance. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: chosen for coverage. Confidence 0.66.

TS zscore of recent sales surprises to capture accelerating beats. SUGGESTION1: used ts_zscore(ts_delta(actual_sales_value_annual, 2), 24) with est_sales used implicitly via delta. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: actual_sales coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: est_sales used earlier. Confidence 0.60.

Difference between reported EPS and median estimate to reduce outlier analyst impact. SUGGESTION1: used earnings_per_share_reported and earnings_per_share_median_value. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high. SUGGESTION4: fields reliable. Confidence 0.73.

Rank stocks by earnings_per_share_standard_deviation to find high disagreement. SUGGESTION1: used zscore(earnings_per_share_standard_deviation). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage ok. SUGGESTION4: standard deviation field has acceptable userCount. Confidence 0.62.

Compare guidance_value_currency_code and guidance_estimate_value consistency (currency mismatch not used). SUGGESTION1: used guidance_estimate_value and sales_guidance_value. SUGGESTION2: not vector. results.idea: Earnings surprise normalized by recent volatility

Use number of brokers (anl4_adxqfv110_pu) vs number of no recommendations (anl4_norec). SUGGESTION1: used anl4_adxqfv110_pu and anl4_norec. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages ~0.7 and 0.6243 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: high userCounts. Confidence 0.58.

Compare net_income_adjusted to est_netprofit_adj to find adjusted surprises. SUGGESTION1: used net_income_adjusted and est_netprofit_adj. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.7 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields have reasonable userCounts. Confidence 0.60.

SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields reliable. Confidence 0.59.

Count of guidance changes via flags; used anl4_fsf_guidance flags (select high coverage flags). SUGGESTION1: used anl4_fcf_flag and anl4_cfo_flag. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages >0.8 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields chosen for revision detection. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Earnings momentum adjusted by estimate dispersion
results.description: TS delta of est_eps divided by earnings_per_share_standard_deviation. SUGGESTION1: used ts_delta(est_eps,7) and earnings_per_share_standard_deviation. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields stable. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Large broker count with low dispersion
results.description: Many brokers but low stddev signals consensus and potential mispricing. SUGGESTION1: used anl4_adxqfv110_pu and earnings_per_share_standard_deviation. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: stddev coverage ok. SUGGESTION4: used high userCount broker field. Confidence 0.61.

Product of last 3 sales surprises to capture consecutive beats. SUGGESTION1: used ts_product(subtract(actual_sales_value_annual, est_sales),3). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: est_sales high userCount. Confidence 0.58.

Reported book value surprise scaled by est_bookvalue_ps to get relative move. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(anl4_bvps_value, est_bookvalue_ps) and divide. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: anl4_bvps_value coverage ~0.5245 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: fields relevant. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Earnings surprise rank over recent quarters
results.description: Rank of aggregated surprises over last 4 quarters. SUGGESTION1: used ts_rank(ts_sum(subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps), 4), 80). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: kept operators within limit. Confidence 0.69.

Normalize gross income surprise by its estimate mean. SUGGESTION1: used gross_income_reported_value and est_grossincome. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields have acceptable counts. Confidence 0.60.

TS delta of anl4_basicconltv110_numest to detect growing analyst attention. SUGGESTION1: used ts_delta(anl4_basicconltv110_numest, 30). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: high userCount field used. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: EPS surprise weighted by broker rating
results.description: Weight EPS surprise by anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue to reflect broker sentiment. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps) and anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: ratingvalue coverage 0.5327 <0.6 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: includes broker signal. Confidence 0.50.

TS delta of earnings_per_share_median_value to detect accelerating consensus. SUGGESTION1: used ts_delta(earnings_per_share_median_value, 30). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: used robust fields. Confidence 0.56.

Compare financing cashflow reported to guidance to find surprises. SUGGESTION1: used financing_cashflow_reported_value and max_financing_cashflow_guidance. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: financing cashflow coverage ~0.4781 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: guidance coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.45.

Difference between operating_profit_before_interest_tax and anl4_ebitda_mean to find margin structure shifts. SUGGESTION1: used operating_profit_before_interest_tax and anl4_ebitda_mean. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields reliable. Confidence 0.61.

Net count of lower estimations signals deterioration. SUGGESTION1: used anl4_basicconqfv110_down and anl4_basicconafv110_numest to form ratio. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages ~0.72 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: used fields with significant userCounts. Confidence 0.64.

Standardize sales guidance exceedance vs estimates. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(sales_guidance_value, est_sales) with ts_backfill on sales_guidance_value because coverage low. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: applied ts_backfill accordingly. SUGGESTION4: est_sales high userCount. Confidence 0.50.

Detect when surprise flips sign compared to previous quarter via last_diff_value. SUGGESTION1: used last_diff_value(subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps), 4). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: operators within limit. Confidence 0.66.

High max guidance across several items could signal management optimism; used maximum_guidance_value and guidance_estimate_value. SUGGESTION1: used both fields; guidance_estimate_value coverage ~0.5848 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: applied ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields moderate userCounts. Confidence 0.46.

Rank surprise divided by recent ts_std_dev across instruments. SUGGESTION1: used divide(subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps), ts_std_dev(ts_delta(est_eps,1),60)) and then zscore. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: est_eps coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: within operator limits. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Cash flow per share surprise scaled
results.description: CFPS actual vs mean scaled by estimate count. SUGGESTION1: used cashflow_per_share_median_value and cashflow_per_share_estimate_count; cashflow_per_share_median_value coverage low so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: applied ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: limited fields. Confidence 0.48.

TS arg max of EPS surprises over 60 days to find recent peaks. SUGGESTION1: used ts_arg_max(subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps), 60). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: concise operator usage. Confidence 0.65.

Difference between highest and lowest EPS estimates to measure skew (anl4_qf_az_eps_mean not used). SUGGESTION1: used anl4_qfv4_eps_high and anl4_qfv4_eps_low. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages 1.0 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields reliable. Confidence 0.58.

Divide sales estimate count by sales_estimate_standard_deviation to find concentrated disagreement. SUGGESTION1: used sales_estimate_count and sales_estimate_standard_deviation. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields have reasonable userCounts. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Earnings surprise vs last quarter surprise
results.description: Compare current EPS surprise to previous quarter via ts_delay to detect acceleration. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps) and ts_delay(subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps), 90). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: high coverage so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: operators within limit. Confidence 0.67.

If guidance type flag changed (anl4_ptp_flag) and EPS surprise positive, stronger signal. SUGGESTION1: used if_else(equal(anl4_ptp_flag, anl4_ptpr_flag), subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps), 0). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: flags coverages high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: simple conditional. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: High estimate count but low surprise
results.description: Find stocks with many estimates but low EPS surprise (mean-reversion candidate). SUGGESTION1: used earnings_per_share_estimate_count and subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields strong. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Sales surprise vs operating cashflow surprise
results.description: Correlation of sales vs CFO surprises over 60 days to find fundamental consistency. SUGGESTION1: used ts_corr(subtract(actual_sales_value_annual, est_sales), subtract(operating_cashflow_reported_value, anl4_cfo_mean), 60). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields reliable. Confidence 0.58.

Max guidance high while mean estimates decreasing indicates potential overoptimism. SUGGESTION1: used max_adjusted_eps_guidance and ts_delta(est_eps, 30). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: est_eps coverage ok. SUGGESTION4: simple two-field implementation. Confidence 0.54.

Use ts_ir of EPS surprises to capture reward/risk of surprise series. SUGGESTION1: used ts_ir(subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps), 60). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: operator available. Confidence 0.68.

Sum of upper and lower revisions indicates activity. SUGGESTION1: used add(anl4_ady_pu, anl4_adxqfv110_down). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages ~0.7 no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields high userCount. Confidence 0.59.

Winsorize surprise then zscore to reduce outliers. SUGGESTION1: used winsorize(subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps), std=4) then zscore. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: stayed within operator limit. Confidence 0.70.

Subtract guidance change magnitude from EPS surprise. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps) and subtract(max_reported_eps_guidance, eps_previous_estimate_value). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: eps_previous_estimate_value coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields reliable. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Sales surprise standardized by recent sd
results.description: Divide sales surprise by ts_std_dev of sales surprises to control volatility. SUGGESTION1: used divide(subtract(actual_sales_value_annual, est_sales), ts_std_dev(ts_delta(est_sales,1),60)). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: operators within limit. Confidence 0.64.

Amplify surprises when many analysts covered the name. SUGGESTION1: multiply(subtract(earnings_per_share_reported, est_eps), earnings_per_share_estimate_count). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: uses robust count. Confidence 0.69.

TS increase in earnings_per_share_standard_deviation signals growing disagreement. SUGGESTION1: used ts_delta(earnings_per_share_standard_deviation,30). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: uses stable fields. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Pretax surprise scaled by net income
results.description: Normalize pretax surprise by net income to get relative move. SUGGESTION1: used subtract(pretax_income_reported_value, est_ptp) and net_income_total_2. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: pretax coverage low so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: CF trends vs EPS trends divergence
results.description: ts_corr of ts_delta(est_cashflow_op,30) and ts_delta(est_eps,30) to find divergence. SUGGESTION1: used est_cashflow_op and est_eps. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: fields chosen for fundamentals. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: High guidance but low estimate growth
results.description: Detect names where guidance is strong but analyst estimates not growing. SUGGESTION1: used max_gross_income_guidance and ts_delta(est_eps, 60). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: guidance coverage high. Confidence 0.52。
